import useAutosaveForm from '../../hooks/useAutosaveForm'; import FormRow from '../../components/FormRow'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function MemberRegistration() { const { user } = useAuth() const nav = useNavigate() const { values, setField, reset } = useAutosaveForm('draft_register', { memberName: user?.name || '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', pincode: '', age: '', gender: 'Prefer not to say', experience: 'Beginner', preferredTime: 'Morning', emergencyName: '', emergencyPhone: '', membershipId: '', consent: false, newsletter: true, idProofUrl: '', gardenRulesAccepted: false, toolsTraining: 'No', disabilitySupport: 'No', notes: '' }) const next = (e)=> { e.preventDefault() // minimal validation if (!values.memberName || !values.email) return alert('Name and Email required') nav('/form/booking') } return (

Member Registration

setField('memberName', e.target.value)} /> setField('email', e.target.value)} /> setField('phone', e.target.value)} /> setField('address', e.target.value)} />

setField('age', e.target.value)} />
